repnme.cdata!:
Argentina - Second Provincial Reform
            Project : Salta

abstracts.cdata!:
The overall rating of the Second
            Provincial Reform Project - Salta is satisfactory. The
            project objective has been met; the project has been highly
            successful in promoting the strengthening of Salta's
            fiscal situation. The operation has promoted the
            implementation of important reforms in the health and
            education sectors aimed at ensuring an efficient and
            responsive delivery of public services within fiscally-sound
            policies. The key lessons of experience include: 1)
            Quick-disbursing loans supporting well-defined reforms can
            be effective tools in promoting structural adjustment at the
            sub-national level. 2) For the reforms to be sustainable, a
            consistent system of incentives has to be in place at the
            national and provincial levels. 3) It is important to
            capitalize on potential windows of opportunities. 4) The
            success of structural adjustment loans (SALs) depend on a
            combination of factors, among the most important of which is
            strong political support. 5) Provincial SAL operations
            require strong coordination across sectors to ensure that
            policy conditionality reinforce the strategies adopted in
            each sector. 6) It is important to enhance public
            participation and to educate the general public on the goals
            and objectives of the reforms to ensure their success and
            sustainability. 6) The combination of effective sector
            leadership for reforms and participatory mechanisms in the
            design and implementation of reforms is a powerful tool for
            pursuing institutional change.

441913.trustfund:
TF035692-ARGENTINA - PROVINCIAL REFORM
            LOANS II AND III,TF023793-SJF-JAPAN-STRUCTURAL ADJUSTMENT

repnme.cdata!:
Argentina - Four Second Provincial Reform
            Adjustment Loan Projects - Rio Negro, Salta, San Juan, and Tucuman

abstracts.cdata!:
The Second Provincial Reform Adjustment
            Loan Projects will help the Tucuman, Rio Negro, Salta and
            San Juan provinces to reform and restructure their
            governments to ensure an efficient and responsive delivery
            of public services (notably social services) within fiscally
            sound policies. The loan will be disbursed depending on
            successful implementation of the following reforms and
            performance benchmarks: 1) public performance reviews will
            assess: whether overall fiscal and debt targets were
            reached, the composition of social sector expenditures, the
            rationale for new borrowing to refinance old debt and/or to
            finance priority investment programs, and the economic
            justification for all large projects; 2) public finance
            reforms include reestablishing provincial fiscal balance by
            improving tax collection, reducing current government
            expenditures - namely civil service reductions, and
            shrinking provincial debt; 3) selected education reforms
            include consolidating classes, controlling absenteeism,
            reducing overhead costs, reconverting public teacher
            training institutions, and introducing new subsidy systems
            for private schools; benchmarks include reducing
            non-essential personnel, improving student-teacher ratios,
            and shifting personnel expenditures towards investment and
            other outlays; and 4) selected health reforms include
            separating provision and financing of public health services
            by giving hospitals autonomy, implementing new management
            and payment systems, improving insurance coverage by
            identifying poor beneficiaries, defining the health package,
            and legally implementing the new insurance system prior to
            the last tranche release.

Argentina - Four Second Provincial Reform
            Adjustment Loan Projects - Rio Negro, Salta, San Juan, and Tucuman
